Container.Name: Plex Auto Languages

Branch.TagDescription: Latest Commit From the Main Branch

Container.Overview: Plex Auto Languages enhances your Plex experience by automatically updating the audio and subtitle settings of TV shows based on your preferences. Similar to Netflix, it remembers your language preferences for each TV show without interfering with global settings or other users' preferences.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: Plex auto language TV show episode Netflix automation

Config.Name: Plex - URL
Config.Description: The URL of your Plex server

Config.Name: Update Level
Config.Description: Update language for the entire show or only the current season (accepted values: 'show' or 'season')

Config.Name: Update Strategy
Config.Description: Update all episodes of the show/season or only the next ones (accepted values: 'next' or 'all')

Config.Name: Trigger on Play
Config.Description: Enable language update when playing a file (default: 'true')

Config.Name: Trigger on Scan
Config.Description: Enable language update when scanning the library for new files (default: 'true')

Config.Name: Trigger on Activity
Config.Description: Enable language update when navigating the Plex library (default: 'false')

Config.Name: Refresh Library on Scan
Config.Description: Refresh the cached library when the Plex server scans its library (default: 'true')

Config.Name: Ignore Labels
Config.Description: Ignore shows with the following Plex labels (comma-separated, e.g., LABEL1,LABEL2)

Config.Name: Notifications Apprise Configs
Config.Description: JSON array of Apprise notification configurations. See Apprise docs for more information: https://github.com/caronc/apprise.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Enable debug mode for detailed logs (default: 'false')
